string-array.name: desription_content
string-array.item: The main objective of Project Manager App is to help you (and your team) manage your projects.
It is designed for small and uncommercial enterprises.
Intentionally, this app was created to help fellow programmers deal with the \'messy\' part of creating a software (that is the management part).
However, it can obviously be used to help manage other kinds of projects that require proper planning and systematic supervision - it\'s completely up to you.
Here are some guidelines, that will tell you how to use Project Manager, by describing all the important components:

string-array.name: info_content
string-array.item: As you can see in Description section, I created this App mostly for programmers to help them work on small projects.

As a matter of fact, the idea for this app (and the will to write it) came to me while working on some other project, that took me quite a lot of time and some of it could be spared, if I had a similar organizing app.
I am aware of the fact that this app isn\'t perfect and doesn\'t necessarily offer the appropriate tools for your particular project.
If you don\'t like it, simlpy don\'t use it - I am sure you can find another app on the market that will suit your needs.
And if you like Project Manager, then please rate it on the Play Market - it will take only a few seconds of your time - a few seconds that can really help me promote my app.

Additionally, I would like to ask you for some feedback (positive or negative) - comments what you like and dislike about my app, what you would like to change or add - that kind of stuff. Please, bear in mind that this is my first Android app, so don\'t be very harsh on me :)
You can reach me by e-mail: tomasz.jurkowski.inf@gmail.com or t.jurkowski@students.mimuw.edu.pl …\n
… or you can find me on Linkedin: http://www.linkedin.com/pub/tomasz-jurkowski/79/79b/6b6 .
I hope you will enjoy using Project Manager!
